title.rendered: Men`s Navy California Splashes Circuit Sideline Pants

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Show your support for the California Splashes with these Circuit Sideline Therma-FIT pants from Splashes![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][stm_icon_list list_type=”font” title=”fa fa-check”]

  • Material: 100% Polyester
  • Therma-FIT ® technology provides warmth with lightweight, breathable material
  • Two side pockets
  • Fleece lined
  • Inseam on size Medium measures approximately 32.5″

[/stm_icon_list][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][stm_icon_list list_type=”font” title=”fa fa-check”]

  • Adjustable bungee drawcord with toggle closure at ankles
  • Screen print graphics
  • Machine wash, tumble dry low
  • Officially licensed
  • Imported
  • Brand: Splashes

[/stm_icon_list][/vc_column][/vc_row]

excerpt.rendered: Show your support for the California Splashes with these Circuit Sideline Therma-FIT pants from Splashes!
